LEADING ONE-STOP E-COMMERCE
SERVICE PROVIDER

Buy Quickly E-commerce Inc. is a leading one-stop e-commerce service provider for international brands at Tmall, D2C site, JD and other main EC platforms. Buy Quickly E-commerce Inc. was founded in Shanghai in 2011. Now we are serving 30+ well-known brands with 500+ employees and 30,000 sqm warehouse

FOCUS ON FASHION/HIGH-END
BRANDED E-COMMERCE

Buy Quickly is an expert in fashion and luxury field, accumulated abundant experience in handling apparel, bag, shoes, watch, jewelry brands during the past 6 years, such as Tissot, Pandora, Sandro, Maje, Clarks, Kipling, Elle, Delsey and etc

OMNI-CHANEL STRATEGR IN CHINA

To drive the brands in Chinese ecommerce ecosystem, we help our clients to develop the multi-channel strategy and execution, including O2O

INTERESTED IN JOINING
BQ TEAM
